concept-wr.title: Dashboard Controls
concept-wr.shortdesc: The HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade web administration interface provides a dashboard for managing all aspects of the system.

conbody.p: See the HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade 2.0 Beta: User Guide.
